attributes.title: HELP ME PLEASE
attributes.review: As a Man of GOD😩 I decided to download this app to show MY president the support he deserves!!!❤️Only for the app to take approximately 12 days and 9 minutes to download🤬 but that’s not daddy’s fault😍! I went to open the app and as soon as I saw that gorgeous blue screen💙 I WAS SUCKED INTO MY PHONE!😮 I’m typing this by jumping on my keyboard. I don’t know what to do😤 This libtard voodoo has me trapped inside 🤯 I’m hungry, thirsty, and my phone is on 33%!!! What will I do when it dies☹️PLEASE HELP ME! President Trump hasn’t done anything wrong so I don’t know why I’m cursed😕 Please tell me what I should do😁

attributes.title: This Cheeto man 🟠
attributes.review: Ok so i was on this app right I hate it  one was when my dog saw I was using this app It had a seizure and died next the police showed up at my door and I had to explain to them why i was using this horrible app I couldn’t explain to them so I got arrested and went to jail two months later I came out and my neighbors  saw me and they beat me almost to death they said they blame the app  for why they beat me after I got out of the hospital I quickly went home to write this review then delete this app .

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS
attributes.review:
I downloaded this back in 2016 after his case with Epstein was cleared out. Wanted to show support to our future dictator but instead I received a dysfunctional app 😔

 when you open the app you are greeted with an inappropriate photo of Trump getting a spray tan. IT WAS HORRIFYING!! The app consists of hundreds upon hundreds of ads to Orange tanning salons. As if I am not already Orange from all of the Cheeto dust I’ve been collecting so I could one day look like daddy trump 😤 

All I gotta say is BEWARE WHEN DOWNLOADING THIS APP! I used it everyday since 2016 and now I have Parkinson’s 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Horrifying
attributes.review: I downloaded the app in the first thing I saw was a logo saying “Trump 2020”. I was so horrified I had to get my mom to go on my phone and uninstall it for me. I am currently in therapy to recover from the trauma I received from opening up this app. A couple flashbacks were actually triggered just going to the App Store for this app to give my opinion and to warn others of the disturbing content this app contains. So please, install and use this app with caution. Never installing again and won’t never recommend to some one else.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: My phone started glitching when I downloaded the app and the app wasn’t even working it would kick me out of the app. It also took forever and slowed down my phone and this never happens to my phone. They should get rid of this app. Also why vote for a RACIST president who has INNOCENT kids locked up in cages as if they were criminals? A president who calls people rapist, savages and drug dealers just by their race and color of their skin. All you white privileged people are about to come and defend him. This is Amerikkka. Make America Great Again.

attributes.title: Horrible app❤️
attributes.review: When I opened the app something terrifying showed up on my screen😟. A Chunky Cheeto puff🦧🟠✨staring at me. I realized it was our racist president🧚🏼‍♀️🥰I quickly closed the app. I didn't want to see anything like that again! That was already one bad thing about the app🙄! Ever since I downloaded this app strange things have been happening😾.My phone was glitching👾, strange music was playing🎶, my neighbors that have a cult to support tRuMp were in the middle of the highway🤪😹💞!!! I could keep on going😈! But anyways- um this app is a no❤️.

attributes.title: What a joke we call a President
attributes.review: The app is the worst thing I ever got when I first downloaded it my phone glitches so bad and decided to break next when I opened it my cat looked at are 🤡 of a President and ran away next the app somehow proceeded to attract roaches (one of my biggest fears other than trump getting reelected) then carried my phone away this is so much worse than anything ever and after realizing people actually like the joke we some how got into Office I will now die dew to Americans being idiots for electing an Orange 🍊 for President

attributes.title: worst app ever!! 🍊
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to try and support my president, but it sadly took 5 years to download and once i did start to use the app it kept glitching to the face of a really orange man! it also made a bunch of cockroaches come out into my living room and start doing a satanic ritual around my phone! the cockroaches even started to pick me up, take me into the middle of the ritual and sacrifice me to the cockroach gods! after they did that they took my body and put it into a meat shredder while my poor family watched! then they started chanting the name donald trump and the next thing i know donald trump is sitting in my living room watching me get shredded up! all in all this is an absolutely terrible app and i wouldn’t recommend downloading it unless you want to get sacrificed to the cockroach gods! 😡🤬🦠💉🔪🔫💣🚔🥊🍊🧚🏼👮‍♂️👁👅👁👁👄👁

attributes.title: Don’t band tiktok
attributes.review: This is trash why would someone make a Trump app this is garbage I hope that this app gets out of the App Store and Trump if you are Reading this I just want to say that you made 2020 like dodo and first coronavirus it was good at first till a mouth later we were bored so we stared to use tiktok it was fun until you came around and trying to band tiktock us do you know how much hate your going to get everyone mad and give you hate I hope when we are protesting for you to not band tiktok you better get ready

attributes.title: Worst app ever DO NOT DOWNLOAD 😤✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking that I could enjoy it MAN was it wrong, there were so many things wrong with it,glitches that made my phone over heat and I just bought it, it was playing a weird sound that idk of and rat other disgusting animals like that came to my phone out of no where, I thought it was nothing of it UNTIL I searched it up and found of it was a calling for rat!!!!😤 I got bit by the rat as well and I think it may have rabies 😳 so yeah AND IM PRETTY SURE 👀 it gave me corana not the rats but the app
